title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-10.9 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-10.9 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Subpart or its application to any person or circumstance is held to be invalid, the remainder of this Subpart and the application of that provision to other persons or circumstances will not be affected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-10.9

Adopted, New

York State Register June 25, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 25, eff. 6/25/2014

Amended

New

York State Register April 22, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 16, eff. 4/22/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
